pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Jacquard's Genetic Identity Coefficients // Contains procedures to estimate the nine condensed Jacquard genetic identity coefficients (Jacquard, 1974) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-88415-3 by constrained least squares (Graffelman et al., 2024) doi:10.1101/2024.03.25.586682 and by the method of moments (Csuros, 2014) doi:10.1016/j.tpb.2013.11.001. These procedures require previous estimation of the allele frequencies. Functions are supplied that estimate relationship parameters that derive from the Jacquard coefficients, such as individual inbreeding coefficients and kinship coefficients.
